meanings.definition: To star or appear with another actor in a movie or play.
meanings.sent1: In the film, the two actors costarring as best friends had great on-screen chemistry.
meanings.sent2: The famous actress will be costarring with a talented newcomer in the upcoming blockbuster.
meanings.sent3: The comedy duo kept costarring in hilarious scenes that had the audience in stitches.
meanings.sent4: Their characters' destinies were costarring in a tale of love and betrayal.
meanings.sent5: The action-packed movie had the two heroes costarring in thrilling fight sequences.

meanings.definition: The act of appearing with another actor in a movie or play.
meanings.sent1: Her costarring in the romantic comedy brought her widespread recognition.
meanings.sent2: The poster proudly displayed the names of the actors in bold, highlighting their costarring.
meanings.sent3: The award ceremony celebrated the best costarring performances of the year.
meanings.sent4: The theater production received rave reviews for its exceptional costarring.
meanings.sent5: The documentary showcased the behind-the-scenes magic of costarring in Hollywood.
